body:
Hello players of avicus!
So i made a montage on the server of me getting a few kills as i am going to start getting into editing but please note that i did not try my hardest on this montage therefor it wont be as great as my future uploads.Thanks!

Time taken: 1 Hour
 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d12PG-EuVSU

title: Minecraft PvP Montage - Nebula Special

replies.body: Man its awesome! Keep it up. :)
replies.body_tagged: Man its awesome! Keep it up. :)

replies.body:
Nice montage! I really love it! I really like your PvP skills, your editing would really nice, only one thing that the screen was turning black and having a weird effect, I don't think it's supposed to be like that, will be happy if you'll fix it.
Other than that, great video, Ill sub once I'll be able to, waiting for more videos!
replies.body_tagged:
Nice montage! I really love it! I really like your PvP skills, your editing would really nice, only one thing that the screen was turning black and having a weird effect, I don't think it's supposed to be like that, will be happy if you'll fix it.
Other than that, great video, Ill sub once I'll be able to, waiting for more videos!
